title: [Large-scale] DGS-Based Project Learning for Exploring Similar Triangle Concepts

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic geometric properties and proportionality concepts
context.additional_context: A learning environment incorporating DGS (Dynamic Geometry Software) tools optimized for smartphones, supported by teacher intervention and worksheets.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the principle of calculating corresponding side ratios in similar triangles using DGS with 80% accuracy
Learners creatively solve at least three real-life problems applying similar triangle identification criteria
Learners systematize digital inquiry activity results into portfolios and achieve an average score of 4 or higher (5-point scale) in peer evaluations

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
